pykoi.application module#

Application module.

class pykoi.application.Application(share: bool = False, debug: bool = False)[source]#

Bases: object

The Application class.

add_component(component: Any)[source]#

Add a component to the application.

Parameters:

component (Any) The component to be added.

create_chatbot_route(app: Flask, component: Dict[str, Any])[source]#

Create chatbot routes for the application.

Parameters:

  • app (Flask) The Flask application.

  • component (Dict[str, Any]) The component for which the routes are being created.

create_feedback_route(app: Flask, component: Dict[str, Any])[source]#

Create feedback routes for the application.

Parameters:

  • app (Flask) The Flask application.

  • component (Dict[str, Any]) The component for which the routes are being created.

run()[source]#

Run the application.
